Name: Angelo Mathews
Teams: Sri Lanka, Kolkata Knight Riders, Sri Lanka A, Pune Warriors, Nagenahira Nagas, Basnahira Greens, Delhi Capitals, Kandy, Sri Lanka Board Presidents XI, Dambulla, Delhi Bulls, Colombo Kings
Bio: A robust batting technique,nagging consistency with the ball,athleticism in the field,all set off by an imperturbable temperament,have made Angelo Mathews one of Sri Lanka's most prized assets  a figure on which the team hangs many hopes,He has risen quickly since earning wide acclaim with an acrobatic save in the 2009 World Twenty20,became Sri Lanka's youngest ever Test captain at 25,after having been groomed for the post for two years
